AAD.caption: Data Type
AAD.name: data_type
AAD.doc: The data type that represents a task in your database. Test

AAE.caption: Data Source
AAE.name: data_source
AAE.doc: The source of list of tasks to display

AAF.caption: ID
AAF.name: id
AAF.doc: The unique ID of the task

AAH.caption: Progress
AAH.name: progress
AAH.doc: A number representing the task's progress out of 100% (ie .20 = 20% // 1 = 100%)

AAK.caption: Dependencies
AAK.name: child_item_ids
AAK.doc: The ID of the related sub-elements (dependencies), formatted as text with each ID separated by comma (ex: "id, id2, id3")

AAc.caption: View Mode
AAc.name: view_mode
AAc.doc: Day, Week, or Month view of the Gantt

AAk.caption: Show Static Columns?
AAk.name: show_table
AAk.doc: Shows/Hide the table on the left side of the Gantt

AAm.caption: Progress bar color
AAm.name: progress_color
AAm.doc: Sets the color of the progress bar.

AAn.caption: Header font color
AAn.name: table_header_font_color
AAn.doc: Sets the font color for the header text.

AAo.caption: Header color
AAo.name: table_header_color
AAo.doc: Specifies the background color of the header.

AAp.caption: Row font color
AAp.name: table_row_font_color
AAp.doc: Defines the font color for text displayed in the row.

AAr.caption: Enable Progress Dragging
AAr.name: toggle_progress_dragging
AAr.doc: Enable/Disable progress update on the task card.

AAs.caption: Enable Polymarkers
AAs.name: show_markers
AAs.doc: Enable/Disable the markers that connect tasks, allowing users to establish dependencies between them.

AAw.caption: Header Date Font Color
AAw.name: header_date_font_color
AAw.doc: Specifies the font color for the header date display."

AAx.caption: Header Date Font Size
AAx.name: header_date_font_size
AAx.doc: Specifies the font size for the header date display

AAy.caption: Header Month Font Color
AAy.name: header_month_font_color
AAy.doc: Specifies the font color for the header month display.

AAz.caption: Header Month Font Size
AAz.name: header_month_font_size
AAz.doc: Specifies the font size for the header month display

ABB.caption: Marker Color
ABB.name: marker_color
ABB.doc: Sets the color of the marker used to establish the relationship between tasks

ABC.caption: Connection Line Color
ABC.name: polyline_color
ABC.doc: Specifies the color of the connection line created when linking two tasks.

ABE.caption: Enable Label Movement
ABE.name: enable_label_movement
ABE.doc: Enable/Disable the task label to move horizontally within the bar as the user scrolls in the Gantt.

ABP.caption: Tooltip background
ABP.name: tooltip_popup_background
ABP.doc: Sets the background color of the tooltip.

ABS.caption: Disable tooltip
ABS.name: disable_tooltip
ABS.doc: Enable/Disable the display of tooltips when hovering over task cards.

ABZ.caption: Task Color
ABZ.name: bar_color
ABZ.doc: Sets the background color of the task bars.

ACA.caption: Default Task Color
ACA.name: bar_color
ACA.doc: The default background color for tasks when no individual task color is specified

ABY.caption: Display Task Detail On Tooltip
ABY.name: display_task_detail_on_hover
ABY.doc: When tooltip is enabled, displays the value of the selected data_type.

ABk.caption: Move Child with Parent
ABk.name: move_child_with_parent
ABk.doc: Enable/Disable the child to move with the parent tasks it is dragged or moved.

headers.snippet:
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/frappe-gantt/dist/frappe-gantt.umd.js"></script> 
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/frappe-gantt/dist/frappe-gantt.css">

<style>
    #gantt .side-header button {
        display: none;
    }
    .gantt .arrow path {
        stroke: red !important;
    }
    th {
    	font-size: 20px !important;
    }
    td {
        font-weight: normal !important;
    }
    .upper-text{
        position: absolute !important;
    }
    .bar-group .handle-group rect.left {
        x: var(--left-handle-x, 0); 
    }

    .bar-group .handle-group rect.right {
        x: var(--right-handle-x, 0); 
    }
    .marker {
        cursor: crosshair;
        display: none;  
        visibility: hidden;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.5s, visibility 0s 0.5s; 
    }

    .bar:hover ~ .marker {
        display: block !important;
        visibility: visible !important;
        opacity: 1 !important;
    }

    .bar:not(:hover) ~ .marker {
        display: block !important;
        visibility: visible !important;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.5s, visibility 0s 0.5s;
        transition-delay: 1s;
    }
    .marker:hover {
        opacity: 1 !important;  
        visibility: visible !important;  
    }
    .marker.dragging {
        opacity: 1 !important;
        visibility: visible !important;
        display: block !important;
        transition: none;
    }

    .handle-group rect {
        display: block !important;
        visibility: visible !important;
        opacity: 1 !important;
    }

        
</style>

AAN.caption: progress bar is updated
AAN.name: progress_changed
AAN.doc: Triggered when the progress bar is updated.

AAO.caption: Date is changed
AAO.name: date_changed
AAO.doc: Triggered when the taskbar is either dragged or resized.

AAb.caption: Task is clicked
AAb.name: task_clicked
AAb.doc: Triggered when a taskbar is clicked.

AAd.name: parent_updated
AAd.caption: Parent-Child link established
AAd.doc: Triggered when a task 's marker is connected to another task's marker

ABG.caption: Table Control Disabled
ABG.name: table_control_disabled
ABG.doc: Triggered when a task's marker is connected to another task's marker, establishing a parent-child link.

ABf.caption: Date Exceeded when dragging
ABf.name: date_exceeded
ABf.doc: Error handling for dragging date handle past its opposite handle.

AAP.caption: Task Id
AAP.name: task_id
AAP.doc: The id of the data that is going to be selected or updated in the workflow.

AAQ.caption: Updated Start Date value
AAQ.name: changed_task_start_date
AAQ.doc: The updated value of the start date data field

AAR.caption: Updated End Date value
AAR.name: changed_task_end_date
AAR.doc: The updated value of the end date data field

AAS.name: changed_task_progress
AAS.caption: Updated Progress value
AAS.doc: The updated value of the progress data field

AAT.caption: View Mode
AAT.name: view_mode
AAT.doc: The value of the current view mode selected in the dropdown.

AAU.caption: Task Name
AAU.name: task_name
AAU.doc: The value of the task name data field, used on clicked event.

AAV.caption: Progress
AAV.name: progress
AAV.doc: The value of the progress data field, used on clicked event.

AAW.caption: Start Date
AAW.name: start_date
AAW.doc: The value of the start date data field, used on clicked event.

AAX.caption: End Date
AAX.name: end_date
AAX.doc: The value of the end date data field, used on clicked event.

AAe.name: new_parent
AAe.caption: Parent ID task
AAe.doc: Parent task id when a polyline is drawn

AAf.caption: Child ID task
AAf.name: child_task_id
AAf.doc: Child task id when a polyline connection is drawn
